name: Veet Wax Strips Sensitive Skin
description: Provides a salon smooth finish at home which lasts for 28 days through just three simple steps; peel, apply and pull. 20 Pre-coated Wax Strips & two perfect finishing wipes are available in one pack. Strips are specially formulated with Almond Oil, providing extra care to suit your sensitive skin *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
